tool_description: Key to text introduces the idea of building a model that would translate keywords into sentences.
name: Key to text
title: Key to text

api_list.name: keytotext
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://key-to-text.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/keytotext"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "key-to-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
